titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the peacefull, obedient, religious, and honest Protestants of this kingdome, presented unto the honourable House of Commons in their behalfe, by Doctor Hynton, 1642. With an answer to the severall objections proposed against him concerning the Protestants petition, by a committee appointed from the honourable House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: Hinton, John, Sir, 1603?-1682.

titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the peacefull, obedient, religious, and honest Protestants of this kingdome, presented unto the honourable House of Commons in their behalfe, by Doctor Hynton, 1642. With an answer to the severall objections proposed against him concerning the Protestants petition, by a committee appointed from the honourable House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: Hinton, John, Sir, 1603?-1682.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Presented in the name of the gentlemen of the four Inns of court. Cf. p. [5].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
